welcome.welcome-subtitle: born in Olavarría, Province of Buenos Aires.

experience.job-description: IT academy that offers programming courses. My role in my position is assisting students in the subjects of Web Development and Databases.

project-descriptions.socialflow: An application inspired by Twitter, with some adjustments to its design. The idea is showcase my skills in the MERN stack.
project-descriptions.pokedex: A webpage to display different Pokémon species and their characteristics. The objective of this project was to consolidate my knowledge in making requests to an API using fetch().
project-descriptions.landingpage: Project done as an activity for TECLAB Institute about Martial Arts. The main idea is to showcase my skills in React.js. Some details include the use of react-router-dom, react-hook-form, and EmailJS to send messages to a professional by email.

about.about-text-first-p: I'm Juan Diego, but my friends call me Juandi. I started in this beautiful world of programming in March 2022 at TECLAB, Technical Superior Institute.
about.about-text-second-p: During my studies, I learned many things, but my true passion is Web Development. How did I discover it? Well, by the end of 2023, all students had to complete a final project, and it was there where I implemented React for the first time. From that moment on, I dedicated every day to this library and the JavaScript ecosystem.
about.about-text-third-p: Currently, I am a graduate, and my greatest achievement was the creation of my project SocialFlow (a Twitter clone), where I included the MERN stack. Within this app, you can sign up, create, edit, and delete posts, modify your profile, follow people, and much more!
